text: Beyonc√© And Jay - Z's Surprise Album Is Here : Listen To'Everything Is Love'Enlarge this image toggle caption Kevork Djansezian / Getty Images Kevork Djansezian / Getty Images Stream The Album On Spotify Please note : The album below contains explicit language. Just when it seemed June couldn't get any hotter for lovers of rap and R & B, the inevitable has finally happened : After a collaboration built on musical legacy and love for the past 15 years, Beyonce and Jay - Z have released a joint album as The Carters. The surprise LP, Everything Is Love, premiered Saturday afternoon exclusively on Tidal, the digital streaming platform owned in part by Jay - Z, but appeared on Spotify on Monday morning. The nine -
